Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.Annotator

  • Packages that use Annotator 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.rawText
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators
    Sentence annotators add annotations to the sentence after the raw text has been processed and broken up into individual sentences.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.

    • Uses of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText

      Subinterfaces of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  RawTextAnnotator
      An annotator for a block of raw text.
      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText that implement Annotator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DuplicateWhiteSpaceFilter
      Gets rid of duplicate whitespace.
      class  NewlineEndOfSentenceMarker
      Replace any newline with a sentence break.
      class  NewlineSpaceMarker
      Replace any newline with a space.
      class  OtherWhiteSpaceFilter
      Replaces any whitespace characters (including tabs) by a standard whitespace.
      class  RawTextRegexAnnotator
      For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches.

    • Uses of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators

      Subinterfaces of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  RegexAnnotator
      A sentence annotator which identifies areas to annotate using a regular expression.
      interface  SentenceAnnotator
      An annotator applied to a single sentence, after processing (e.g.
      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators that implement Annotator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRegexAnnotator
      A parent class for RegexAnnotator implementations, which knows how to construct the Pattern using the various attributes set and the initial regex, and how to apply the regex to get the matching placeholders.

      The following parameters are recognised: group: see RegexAnnotator.getGroupIndex() caseSensitive: see RegexAnnotator.isCaseSensitive() diacriticSensitive: see RegexAnnotator.isDiacriticSensitive() autoWordBoundaries: see RegexAnnotator.isAutoWordBoundaries()

      Any additional unrecognised parameters are assumed to be token attributes.
      class  RegexAttributeAnnotator
      A Regex annotator which only adds attributes to any tokens entirely contained by the match.
      class  RegexTokenAnnotator
      A regex annotator which tokenises the matched group as a single separate token, and offers the possibility of a replacement string to replace the token text.

      In addition to the parameters recognised by AbstractRegexAnnotator, recognises: replacement: see RegexTokenAnnotator.getReplacement(). analysisText: see RegexTokenAnnotator.getAnalysisText().

    • Uses of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector that implement Annotator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SentenceDetector
      Detects sentence boundaries within an annotated text.

    • Uses of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser that implement Annotator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleTokeniser
      A simplistic implementation of a Tokeniser, using only TokenFilters and default decisions.
      class  Tokeniser
      A Tokeniser splits a sentence up into tokens (parsing units).

      It adds annotations of type TokenBoundary to the sentence, which are guaranteed not to overlap.

      The Tokeniser must recognise the following annotations in the sentence provided:
      TokenPlaceholder: will get replaced by a token. TokenAttribute: will add attributes to all tokens contained within its span.

    • Uses of Annotator in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns that implement Annotator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PatternTokeniser
      The compound pattern tokeniser first splits the text into individual tokens based on a list of separators, each of which is assigned a default value for that separator.
